Title: User Authentication & Authorization
Description: Implement Windows Authentication integration with Active Directory for secure user access and role-based authorization

Title: Windows Authentication Integration
Description: Enable Windows Authentication to automatically identify users through Active Directory credentials

Title: User Login with Windows Credentials
Description: As a corporate user I want to automatically log in using my Windows credentials so that I don't need separate login credentials
Acceptance Criteria:
- User is automatically authenticated when accessing the application
- Username is retrieved from Windows identity
- No separate login form is required
- Failed authentication shows appropriate error message

Description: Test Windows authentication with different browsers and AD scenarios

Title: Role-Based Access Control
Description: Implement role-based authorization using Active Directory groups to control user permissions

Title: Service Desk Full Access
Description: As a member of IT_ServiceDesk group I want to have full access to all features so that I can manage inventory and configurations
Acceptance Criteria:
- Service Desk users can view all pages
- Service Desk users can edit inventory
- Service Desk users can upload CSV files
- Service Desk users can modify configurations
- Service Desk users see Admin link in navigation

Description: Build custom authorization attribute to check AD group membership

Description: Create service to query AD for user group membership

Description: Apply ADGroupAuthorization attribute to protected endpoints

Title: Update Frontend User Context
Description: Store user roles in React context from /api/user/me endpoint

Title: Conditionally Show UI Elements
Description: Show/hide buttons and navigation based on user roles

Title: Read-Only User Access
Description: As a member of IT_ReadOnly group I want to view inventory data without editing capabilities so that I can monitor stock levels
Acceptance Criteria:
- Read-Only users can view Dashboard
- Read-Only users can view Inventory List
- Read-Only users can view Audit Log
- Read-Only users cannot see Assign buttons
- Read-Only users cannot see Admin link
- Read-Only users cannot upload CSV

Description: Check for IT_ReadOnly group membership and set appropriate role flags

Description: Conditionally hide all edit buttons and forms for read-only users

Description: Verify UI renders correctly for different user roles

Title: Inventory Management System

Acceptance Criteria:
- Dashboard displays total items count
- Dashboard shows low stock items count

- Dashboard shows inventory breakdown chart by category
